name: foul-play
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Damage is calculated using the target’s attacking stat rather than the user’s.
short_effect: Calculates damage with the target’s attacking stat.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the move’s power.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user turns the target’s power against it. The higher the target’s Attack stat, the greater the damage it deals.
